msItem.title: Lubb 'Ain al-Buka'.
msItem.note: An account of the martyrdoms of the descendants of 'Ali and Fatimah. Abbreviated from the same author's 'Ain al-Buka'. Author is presumably 'Ali Naqi b, Ahmad Burujirdi. Lacks the beginning of the introduction including the authors name, but gives the title and agrees with the work described by Storey as being an abbreviated version, though lacking any obvious division into sections. Some red headings and punctuation.
msItem.incipit: ... budah wa asl-i in nuskhah-ra namzad-i zawiyah nishinan

listBibl.bibl: Storey, i, p. 219. (Only two MSS, in India)

bindingDesc.p: Has been conserved and bound in a red cloth binding, the pages attached at the top end. In red cloth covered case. Some fragments and notes left from conservation are in a grey card folder in the same box.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
